snippet.title: WAR OPERATION™ Full Contact - Pre Alpha Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Iraq, April 2003, in the midst of a frighteningly intense confrontation. Iraqi army against the U.S. Marines, take your class, your weapons and run through Baghdad streets, near Firdos Square, frozen in the days of Saddam Hussein's regime. A unique and exceptional experience never seen before.

First official public video of the WAR OPERATION™ Full Contact game showing the first foundations of a monstrously breathtaking multiplayer TPS game.

The pre alpha is currently available to those who have access to the private alpha. The game will soon be available for purchase in Early Access on Steam, you will continually receive updates to the game throughout its development. Take a look at our roadmap.

In the meantime, join the community: discord.waroperation.com
